name: Minecraft Edgar - Portalrun 1 Beta
description:
A Minecraft Indie game - Its a perfect Dublicate of the Mojang Minecraft Version 1.10 and there is also a story! The Minecraft Pig "Edgar", from the Youtuber Paluten, is scared from spiders. When spiders came next to him he ran away and get in a portal to a cave with Zombies, Skeletons and Endermans. Now it's your turn! You can help Edgar to find back to his home!

Created by LeakZ
